description: Standard FABER workflow for claude-plugins repository (Frame → Architect → Build → Evaluate → Release). Note: Issue fetch (faber-director), branch creation (Build entry), and PR creation (Release exit) are automatic primitives - no explicit steps needed.

frame.description: Frame: Validate work context and prepare for workflow. Issue fetch is automatic (faber-director Step 0.5).

architect.description: Architect: Generate technical specification. Work type classification is automatic at phase entry.

steps.name: Generate Specification
steps.description: Generate technical specification from requirements (conditional based on work type)

build.description: Build: Implement solution and commit changes. Branch creation is automatic at phase entry.

steps.name: Implement Solution
steps.description: Implement the solution based on specification

steps.name: Create Commit
steps.description: Commit implementation with semantic commit message

evaluate.description: Evaluate: Test, review, and validate implementation

release.description: Release: Update docs and finalize. PR creation is automatic at phase exit.

pre_architect.name: architecture-standards
pre_architect.description: Load architecture standards for design phase

autonomy.description: Pauses before release for approval - recommended for production

removed_steps.frame.classify: Now automatic in faber-manager at Architect phase entry
removed_steps.frame.setup-env: Now automatic in faber-manager at Build phase entry
removed_steps.release.create-pr: Now automatic in faber-manager at Release phase exit

_migration_notes.backward_compatibility: Explicit primitive steps are still supported but will be no-ops if automatic primitive already executed
